free: #e there is an old man.
#c 有一個老人，
#e when the fruit ripe
#c 水果成熟的時候。
#e probably it is guava or pear.
#c 可能是芭樂或是梨子。
#n IU10 quti 'dung 糞', rodux 'rooster 雞'
#e the fruits are big.
#c 水果很大。
#e the old man goes up ladder and he picks fruits.
#c 老人走上梯子去採收。
#e That old man carries baskets to put fruits.
#c 那個老人帶藍子放水果。
#e And also (he) carries a ladder.
#c （他）還帶梯子。
#e the mother tree is big
#c 那棵樹很大，
#e When the tree bears fruits, you cannot reach hand to pick up. One has to climb ladder up to pick (them) up.
#c 水果結果實的時候，伸手也拿不到，必須爬梯子上去採收。
#e the old man is picking fruits.
#c 這老人在摘水果。
#e then when he picks two baskets of fruits,
#c 然後他採兩籃水果的時候，
#e an elder boy passes there.
#c 一個青年經過那裡。
#e he carries a sheep.
#c 他牽著羊，
#e maybe he is going to feed the sheep.
#c 可能他去餵羊。
#e then carrying the sheep, he passed under the tree that the old man is picking fruits.
#c 牽著羊，他經過老人正在採水果的果樹下面。
#e he passes, go toward the place where he raises sheep.
#c 他經過，然後往他養羊的地方走去。
#e in a short while, there is a child.
#c 不久有一個小孩，
#e he is riding a rulu. Rulu is a bike.
#c 他在騎rulu。Rulu是腳踏車的意思。
#e jidensha is the Japanese word,
#c jidensha是日語。
#e the child is riding bike and he comes under...
#c 然後這小孩騎腳踏車來下面...
#n IU82 moda=muda
#e he saw the old man is picking fruits above.
#c 他看到老人在上面採水果。
#e then he put picked fruits on the ground.
#c 然後他把採過的水果放在地上，
#e basket is put on the ground.
#c 然後在地上放著籃子。
#e thus at that time, the child left.
#c 接著那時候這小孩離開了。
#e he saw the old man, picking fruits up there.
#c 他看老人在上面那裡採收，
#e at that time, the old man is picking fruits very hard,
#c 然後那時候，老人專心地採收，
#e he did not even know the child was looking.
#c 他並不知道小孩在看。
#e he stole one basket of fruits.
#c 他偷一籃水果。
#e the fruit looks like guava.
#c 水果看起來是芭樂。
#e then he put basket in front of his bike,
#c 然後他把籃子放在他腳踏車前面，
#e then he sees the old man,
#c 然後他看這個老人，
#e probably he is saying that 'it is okay, he is not seeing'.
#c 可能在說：「沒有關係，他沒在看。」
#n IU 128 ini huwa 'it does not matter 沒關係'
#e at that time he stole and carried the basket.
#c 那時候他偷籃子帶走，
#e the child is going house.
#c 小孩回家，
#e the fruit he stealthily took away, I wonder where he brings or whether he sells.
#c 他偷偷帶走的果實，不曉得要帶到那裏或要賣。
#e when he is on the way, before arriving at his house, he met a girl.
#c 在路上，還沒到家的時候，他遇見一個女孩。
